<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	c.1)
<U>
	Provisions for probable
	civil and regulatory contingencies
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Provisions for civil contingencies
	assessed as probable loss
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The Company and/or
	its subsidiaries are parties to proceedings involving rights to the supplementary amounts from shares calculated on network expansion
	plans since 1996 (supplement of share proceedings). These proceedings are at different stages: lower courts, court of justice and
	high court of justice. At December 31, 2016, provisions totaled R$256,276 (R$190,004 at December 31, 2015).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The Company and/or
	its subsidiaries are parties to various civil proceedings related to consumers at the administrative and judicial level, relating
	to failure to supply services and/or products sold. At December 31, 2016, provisions totaled R$386,699 (R$435,782 at December 31,
	2015).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The Company and/or
	its subsidiaries are parties to various civil proceedings of a non-consumer nature at administrative and judicial levels, all arising
	in the ordinary course of business. At December 31, 2016, provisions totaled R$396,382 (R$384,570 at December 31, 2015).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Provisions for regulatory
	contingencies assessed as probable losses
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company is party to administrative
	proceedings against ANATEL, filed based on an alleged failure to meet sector regulations, and to judicial proceedings to contest
	sanctions applied by ANATEL at the administrative level. At December 31, 2016, provisions totaled R$828,934 (R$642,695 at December
	31, 2015).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	c.2)
<U>
	Provisions for civil
	and regulatory contingencies assessed as possible losses
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Civil contingencies assessed
	as possible losses
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Management and its legal counsel
	understand that losses are possible in the following civil proceedings:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Civil Class Action
	in which the Company is involved relating to the Community Telephone Plan (PCT), on possible rights to indemnify acquirers of expansion
	plans who allegedly did not receive shares for their financial investments made in the city of Mogi das Cruzes, with the total
	consolidated amount involved on December 31, 2015 of R$421,085. The S&atilde;o Paulo Court of Justice (TJSP) changed its decision,
	and judged this matter groundless. The carriers association of Mogi das Cruzes (&ldquo;claimant&rdquo; or &ldquo;Association&rdquo;)
	filed a special appeal to reverse that decision. On December 7, 2015, the appeal filed by the Association was dismissed by the
	High Court of Justice. The Association filed Motions for Clarification, which were not accepted by the High Court of Justice on
	March 17, 2016. On April 15, 2016,
	a final decision was handed down, and no further appeals can be filed. The process was dismissed.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 210; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	F-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	56
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage211"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<A HREF="#DP73142_20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Collective Action
	filed by SISTEL Participants' Association (ASTEL) in the state of S&atilde;o Paulo, in which SISTEL associates in the state of
	S&atilde;o Paulo challenge the changes made in the health insurance plan for retired employees (&ldquo;PAMA&rdquo;) and claim for
	the reestablishment of the prior &ldquo;status quo&rdquo;. This proceeding is still in the appeal phase, and awaits a decision
	on the Interlocutory Appeal filed by the Company against the decision on possible admission of the appeal to higher and supreme
	courts filed in connection with the Court of Appeals' decision, which changed the decision rendering the matter groundless. The
	amount cannot be estimated, and the claims cannot be settled due to their unenforceability because it entails the return to the
	prior plan conditions.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Civil Class Actions
	filed by ASTEL, in the state of S&atilde;o Paulo, and by the Brazilian National Federation of Associations of Retirees, Pensioners
	and Pension Fund Members of the Telecommunications Industry (FENAPAS), both against SISTEL, the Company and other carriers, in
	order to annul the spin-off of the PBS private pension plan, alleging, in short, the &ldquo;windup of the supplementary private
	pension plan of the SISTEL Foundation&rdquo;, which led to various specific mirror PBS plans, and corresponding allocation of funds
	from technical surplus and tax contingencies existing at the time of the spin-off. The amount cannot be estimated, and the claims
	cannot be settled due to their unenforceability because this involves the return of the spun-off assets of SISTEL relating to telecommunication
	carries of the former Telebr&aacute;s System.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The Public Prosecutor&rsquo;s
	Office of S&atilde;o Paulo State began a civil class action claiming pain, suffering and damages suffered by all consumers of telecommunications
	services from 2004 to 2009 due to the bad quality of services and failures of the communications system. The Public Prosecutor&rsquo;s
	Office suggested that the indemnification to be paid should be R$ 1 billion. The decision handed down on April 20, 2010 imposes
	the payment of indemnification for damages caused to all consumers who have filed a suit for such damages. The Company filed an
	appeal tried on April 13, 2015, and it was unanimously decided that the lower court decision should be amended and the claim should
	be dismissed. The Public Prosecutor&rsquo;s Office of S&atilde;o Paulo State appealed against this decision and filed an appeal
	to higher and supreme courts. The Company submitted counterarguments to this appeal to higher and supreme courts. The appeals to
	higher and supreme courts were not accepted and the Company is awaiting a citation in connection with an appeal that may be filed
	by the Public Prosecutor&rsquo;s Office of S&atilde;o Paulo State.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Conversely, in the event
	that the number of claiming consumers is not in line with the extent of damages, after the lapsing of one year, the judge determined
	that the amount of R$60 million should be deposited in the Special Expenses Fund to Recover Natural Rights Damages (Fundo Especial
	de Despesa de Repara&ccedil;&atilde;o de Interesses Difusos Lesados). It is not possible to estimate the number of consumers who
	will individually file suits, or the amounts claimed thereby. The parties filed an appeal on the merits of the case. The judgment
	effects are in abeyance. No amount has been assigned to the possible likelihood of an unfavorable outcome in connection with the
	civil class action described above, since, in the case of loss, estimating the corresponding amount payable by the Company is not
	practicable at this time. Likewise, establishing a provision for contingency equivalent to the amount sought is not possible.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The Company is
	party to other civil claims, at several levels, related to service rendering rights. Such claims have been filed by individual
	consumers, civil associations representing consumer rights or by the Bureau of Consumer Protection (PROCON), as well as by the
	Federal and State Public Prosecutor&rsquo;s Office. The Company is also party to other claims of several types related to the ordinary
	course of business. At December 31, 2016, the amount totaled to R$2,559,252 (R$2,146,850 at December 31, 2015).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	TGLog is party
	to a civil execution proceeding filed with the 3rd Civil Court of Barueri, S&atilde;o Paulo State, owing to alleged non-payment
	of transportation service bills. TGLog alleges that it made legitimate discounts owing to contract breaches and losses arising
	from damages to goods of its customers transported by the claimant, which are also subject matter of another proceeding. At December
	31, 2016, the amount was R$1,377 (R$1,022 at December 31, 2015).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The Company has
	received notices regarding noncompliance with the Customer Service (SAC) Decree. The Company is currently party to various lawsuits
	(administrative and legal proceedings). At December 31, 2016 the amount was R$14,207 (R$12,881 at December 31, 2015).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 211; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	F-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	57
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage212"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<A HREF="#DP73142_20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Intellectual Property:
	Lune Projetos Especiais Telecomunica&ccedil;&atilde;o Com&eacute;rcio e Ind. Ltda. (Lune), a Brazilian company, filed an action
	on November 20, 2001 against 23 wireless carriers claiming to own the patent for caller ID and the trademark &ldquo;Bina&quot;.
	The purpose of that lawsuit was to interrupt provision of such service by carriers and to seek indemnification equivalent to the
	amount paid by consumers for using the service.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	An unfavorable decision
	was handed down determining that the Company should refrain from selling mobile phones with Caller ID service (&ldquo;Bina&rdquo;),
	subject to a daily fine of R$10,000 in case of noncompliance. Furthermore, according to that decision, the Company must pay indemnification
	for royalties, to be calculated in settlement. Motions for Clarification were opposed by all parties and Lune&rsquo;s motions for
	clarification were accepted since an injunctive relief in this stage of the proceedings was deemed applicable. A bill of review
	appeal was filed in view of the current decision which granted a stay of execution suspending that unfavorable decision until final
	judgment of the review. A bill of review was filed in view of the sentence handed down on June 30, 2016, by the 4th Chamber of
	the Court of Justice of the Federal District, in order to annul the lower court sentence and remit the proceedings back to the
	lower court for a new examination. There is no way to determine the extent of potential liabilities with respect to this claim.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The Company and
	other wireless carriers figure as defendants in several lawsuits filed by the Public Prosecutor&rsquo;s Office and consumer associations
	to challenge imposition of a period to use prepaid minutes. The plaintiffs allege that the prepaid minutes should not expire after
	a specific period. Conflicting decisions were handed down by courts on the matter, even though the Company understands that its
	criteria for the period determination comply with ANATEL standards. Based on the legal counsel&rsquo;s opinion, class actions have
	a remote likelihood of loss.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Regulatory contingencies
	assessed as possible losses
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	According
	to the Company&rsquo;s management and legal counsel, the likelihood of loss of the following regulatory civil proceedings is possible:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The Company is
	party to administrative proceedings filed by ANATEL alleging noncompliance with the obligations set forth in industry regulations,
	as well as legal claims which discuss the sanctions applied by ANATEL at the administrative level. At December 31, 2016, the amount
	was R$5,018,205 (R$3,716,106 for the Company at December 31, 2015).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Administrative
	and judicial proceedings discussing payment of 2% charge on interconnection services revenue arising from the extension of right
	of use of SMP related radio frequencies. Under clause 1.7 of the authorization term that grants right of use of SMP related radio
	frequencies, the extension of right of use of such frequencies entails payment every two years, during the extension period (15
	years) of a 2% charge calculated on net revenues from the service provider&rsquo;s Basic and Alternative Plans of the service company,
	determined in the year before that of payment.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	However, ANATEL determined
	that in addition to revenues from Service Plans, the charge corresponding to 2% should also be levied on interconnection revenues
	and other operating revenues, which is not stipulated in clause 1.7 of referred Authorization Term.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Considering, based on the
	provisions of the Authorization Terms, that revenue from interconnection services should not be included in the calculation of
	the 2% charge for radiofrequency use right extension, the Company filed administrative and legal proceedings challenging these
	charges, based on ANATEL&rsquo;s position.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 12PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -12PT">
<B>
	d)
<U>
	Guarantees
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 12PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company and its subsidiaries
	granted guarantees for tax, civil and labor proceedings, as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
</P>

	to the guarantees presented above, the Company and its subsidiaries had amounts under short-term investment frozen by courts (except

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN; COLOR: RED">

</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	This refers mainly to the balances of revenues from recharging prepaid
	services, which are recognized in income as services are provided to customers. It includes the amount of the agreement the Company
	entered into for industrial use of its mobile network by a different SMP operator in Regions I, II and III of the general authorizations
	plan (&ldquo; PGA&rdquo; ), which is intended solely for the rendering of SMP services by the operator for its customers.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	Includes the net balances of the residual values from sale of non- strategic
	towers and rooftops, which are transferred to income as the conditions for recognition are fulfilled.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	This refers to the deferred activation revenue (fixed) recognized in income
	over the estimated period in which a customer remains in the base.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	This refers to points earned under the Company's loyalty program, which
	enables customers to accumulate points by paying bills relating to use of services offered. The balance represents the Company's
	estimate of customers&rsquo; exchanging points for goods and / or services in the future.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	This refers to: (i) government subsidy arising from funds obtained from
	BNDES credit lines to be used in the acquisition of domestic equipment, which have been amortized over the useful life cycle of
	the equipment; and (ii) subsidies arising from projects related to state taxes, which are being amortized over the contractual
	period.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

	(6)
</TD>

	which are amortized over their useful life cycles.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	Includes amounts of the reimbursement for costs for leaving radio frequency sub-bands 2,500MHz to 2,690MHz due to cancellation
	of the Multichannel Multipoint Distribution Service (MMDS).

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(1) URTJLP - Long-Term Interest
	Rate Reference Unit used by BNDES as contractual currency for loans.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT">
	(2)
	UMBND - Monetary unit based on a basket of currencies used by BNDES as contractual currency for loans based on funding obtained
	in a foreign currency.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT">
	(3)
	ECM - rate announced by BNDES each quarter for currency-basket charges.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a.1)
<U>
	Loans and financing
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Brazilian Development Bank
	(BNDES)
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	BNDES - FINEM
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">

	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<U>
	Contract 11.2.0814.1:
</U>
	On October 14, 2011, credit facilities were approved amounting to R$3,031,110, adjusted to R$2,152,098 in 2013, at rates of: (i)
	TJLP + 4.08% p.a.; and (ii) UMBND + 2.38% p.a., maturating in 8 years, with a grace period expiring on July 15, 2014. After the
	grace period, interest and amortization of principal will be paid in 60 consecutive monthly installments.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The total amount of these
	funds have been withdrawn by the Company and used in investments in expansion and improvement of the current network, implementation
	of the infrastructure required for new technologies from 2011 and 2013, and construction of a data center in the city of Tambor&eacute;
	(SP) and social projects.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<U>
	Contract 08.2.1073.1:
</U>
	On December 12, 2008, credit facilities were approved amounting to R$615,909, at rates of: (i) IPCA + 2.95% p.a. + TR, maturating
	in 8 years, with a grace period expiring on June 15, 2011. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal were
	paid in 6 consecutive monthly installments, having been settled on July 15, 2016; e (ii) TJLP + 2.05% to 2.95% p.a., maturating
	in 9 years, with a grace period expiring on June 15, 2011. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal will
	be paid in 72 consecutive monthly installments.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Total amount of this credit
	facility was already withdrawn and the funds allocated to investments in domestically produced goods and services. After BNDES
	authorization, on June 21, 2010, this contract was partially settled in advance. Amounts presented in this note consider the partial
	settlement made on July 15, 2010 plus contractual and regular amortizations starting on July 15, 2011.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<U>
	Contract 11.2.0963.1:
</U>
	On November 9, 2011, credit facilities were approved in the amount of R$1,184,107, at rates of: (i) TJLP + 0 to 3.38% p.a., maturating
	in 9 years, with a grace period expiring on August 15, 2014. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal will
	be paid in 72 consecutive monthly installments; and (ii) 5% p.a., maturating in 8 years, with a grace period expiring on August
	15, 2014. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal will be paid in 63 consecutive monthly installments.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company made withdrawals
	relating to this agreement and the remaining R$45,490, was canceled on April 9, 2014. These funds were intended to complement the
	investment plan for the triennium 2011-2013, intended to expand operations, modernize telecommunications and internet services,
	and launch new services.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<U>
	Contract 14.2.1192.1:
</U>
	On December 30, 2014, credit facilities were approved in the amount of R$1,000,293, at rates of: (i) TJLP + 0 to 3.12% p.a., (ii)
	4% p.a., (iii) Selic + 2.32% p.a., maturating in 8 years, with a grace period will expire on January 15, 2018. After the grace
	period, interest and amortization of principal will be paid in 60 consecutive and (iv) 6% p.a., a total term of 7 years, with grace
	period expiring on January 15, 2017. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal will be paid in 60 consecutive
	monthly installments
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Until September 30, 2016,
	withdrawals related to this agreement were made in the amount of R$800,234. On December 12, 2016, a new withdrawal was made in
	the amount of R$176,843. These resources are destined to the investment plan for the 2014-2016 triennium, aiming at expansion in
	the areas of operation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	BNDES - PSI
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Between December
	3, 2009 and August 17, 2010, credit facilities of up to R$319,927 were approved (with R$184,489 drawn down and a remaining balance
	of R$135,438 cancelled), with rates from 4.5% and 5.5% p.a., a total term of 10 years, with grace period expired on February 15,
	2012. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal are paid in 96 consecutive monthly installments
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Between November
	24, 2010 and March 31, 2011, credit facilities amounting to R$29,066 were approved, at rates of (i) 5.5% p.a.; (ii) TJLP + 5.7%
	p.a.; and TJLP + 9.0% p.a., a total term of 5 years, with grace period expired on January 15, 2012. After the grace period, interest
	and amortization of principal are paid in 48 consecutive monthly installments. On December 31, 2016, all lines were settled, and
	the last payment was made on April 15, 2016.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	On December 28,
	2010, a credit facility amounting to R$5,417 was approved, subsequently restated to R$2,262, at the rate of 5.5% p.a., a total
	term of 10 years, with grace period expired on January 15, 2013. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal
	are paid in 96 consecutive monthly installments. This credit facility was fully withdrawn by the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	On December 28,
	2012, credit facilities amounting to R$353,483 were approved, subsequently restated to R$225,467, at the rate of 2.5% p.a., a total
	term of 5 years, with grace period expired on January 15, 2015. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal
	are paid in 36 consecutive monthly installments. This credit facility was fully withdrawn by the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	On August 1, 2013,
	credit facilities amounting to R$4,030 were approved, at the rate of 3.5% p.a., a total term of 5 years, with grace period expired
	on August 15, 2015. After the grace period, interest and amortization of principal are paid in 36 consecutive monthly installments.
	This credit facility was fully withdrawn by the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Some financing agreements with
	the BNDES described above, have lower interest rates than those prevailing on the market. These operations fall within the scope
	of IAS 20 and thus the subsidies granted by BNDES were adjusted to present value deferred in accordance with the useful lives of
	the financed assets, resulting in a balance until December 31, 2016 as of R$44,415 (R$47,346 at December 31, 2015), note 19.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Banco do Nordeste (&quot;BNB&quot;)
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	On January 29,
	2007 and October 30, 2008, credit facilities amounting to R$247,240 and R$389,000 respectively, were obtained, at the rate of 10%
	p.a., a total term of 8 years, with grace period expired on July 29, 2008 and October 30, 2010, respectively. After the grace periods,
	interest and amortization of principal are paid in 78 and 72 consecutive monthly installments, respectively.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	These credit facilities
	were fully withdrawn and the funds were used for investment projects to implement and expand cellular mobile network capacity in
	the Northeast. On January 29, 2015, the first credit facility was settled.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The lines were fully settled
	on January 29, 2015 and October 30, 2016, respectively. The balance on this agreement at December 31, 2015 was R$54,039.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	On August 18, 2014,
	credit facilities amounting to R$31,619 and R$115,014 were obtained at annual interest rates of 7.06% and 8.24%, respectively,
	for a total term of 8 years, with payment of interest charges and payment of principal in 72 installments. On April 17, 2015, the
	amount of R$5,719 was drawn down on the first facility and R$38,959 on the second.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	These funds were used for
	investment projects and expansion in Brazil&rsquo;s Northeast region.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The balance of this agreement
	at December 31, 2016 was R$42,290 (R$45,095 at December 31, 2015).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Brazilian Central Bank (&ldquo;BACEN&rdquo;)
	- Resolution 4131
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In the period from November
	10 to December 23, 2015, loans were taken out in foreign currency (US dollar) under BACEN Resolution No. 4131. The amount of US$285
	million was taken out from Scotiabank and Bank of America, at the rate of 2.05% p.a. from Scotiabank, and Libor + 2% p.a. from
	Bank of America, both maturing within 2 years. For each of these transactions derivatives were taken out by the Company for hedge
	against currency risk related to this debt and, for being effective hedge, fair value hedge accounting methodology was adopted.
	Therefore, at December 31, 2016, the hedged risk of these instruments was recognized in the balance sheet for its fair value at
	this date.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Retrospective tests are applied
	every quarter to check the hedge effectiveness. At December 31, 2016, effectiveness was of 100%.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a.2)
<U>
	Financing - Suppliers
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Under bilateral agreements with
	suppliers, the Company obtained extension of the terms for payment of trade accounts payable by up to 365 days at a cost based
	on fixed CDI rate for the corresponding periods. On December 31, 2016, the total amounted was R$722,591 (R$1,228,682 at December
	31, 2015) and its average net cost of 108.4% of the CDI rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a.3)
<U>
	Finance lease
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Finance lease agreements, through
	which the Company and its subsidiaries obtained the risks and benefits associated with ownership of the leased items, are capitalized
	on the lease inception date at the fair value of the asset leased or, if lower, at the present value of the minimum payments of
	lease agreement. If applicable, the initial direct costs incurred in the transaction are added to costs.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Agreements classified as finance
	lease agreements in the condition of lessee relate to: (i) lease of towers and rooftops arising from sale and finance leaseback
	transactions; (ii) lease of Built to Suit (&quot;BTS&quot;) sites to install antennas and other equipment and transmission facilities;
	(iii) lease of information technology equipment and; (iv) lease of infrastructure and transmission facilities associated with the
	power transmission network connecting cities in the North and Midwest regions of Brazil. The net carrying amount of the assets
	has remained unchanged until sale thereof, and a liability is recognized corresponding to the present value of mandatory minimum
	installments of the agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The amounts recorded in property,
	plant and equipment are depreciated over the estimated useful lives of the assets or the lease term, whichever is shorter.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 216; VALUE: 1 -->

	F-

	62

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_79"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	There are no unsecured residual
	values resulting in benefits to the lessor or contingent payments recognized as revenue at December 31, 2016 and 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a.4)
<U>
	Contingent consideration
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	As part of the Purchase and
	Sale Agreement and Other Covenants executed by and between the Company and Vivendi to acquire all shares in GVTPart, a contingent
	consideration relating to the judicial deposit made by GVT for the monthly installments of deferred income and social contribution
	taxes on goodwill amortization was agreed, arising from the corporate restructuring process completed by GVT in 2013. In September
	2014, GVT applied for cancellation of the court appeal and the return of the deposited amount.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If GVT succeeds in receiving
	(being reimbursed, refunded for, or netting) these funds, they will be returned to Vivendi, as long as they are obtained in a final
	unappeasable decision. Reimbursement will be made within 15 years.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The amount calculated on the
	effective date of acquisition of control of GVTPart (Note 4) is R$344,217 (R$414,733 at December 31, 2016), recorded as &quot;Judicial
	deposits, noncurrent&quot; in GVT. This amount is subject to monthly restatement at the SELIC rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	b)
<U>
	Debentures
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Information on the debentures
	at December 31, 2016 and 2015:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT; COLOR: #222222">
	(1)
	Issue of non-privileged 3-series public unsecured nonconvertible debentures, all registered- and book entry-type. The 1st (98,000
	debentures) and 2nd series (640,000 debentures) were redeemed and cancelled on November 14, 2014 and November 13, 2015, respectively.
	During the renegotiation of 3rd series, the Company partially repurchased 48,443 debentures, and kept held them in treasury for
	subsequent cancelation. Funds obtained were allocated to full payment of principal debt amount, represented by 6th issue of promissory
	notes and to bolster working capital.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT; COLOR: #222222">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT; COLOR: #222222">
	(2)
	Issue of non-privileged 3-series public unsecured nonconvertible debentures, all registered- and book entry-type. Debentures subscribed
	by the Minas Gerais State Economic Development Department under Minas Comunica Program, in order to meet SMP for 134 locations
	in the state.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT; COLOR: #222222">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT; COLOR: #222222">
	(3)
	Non-privileged single series public unsecured nonconvertible debentures, all registered- and book entry-type. Funds obtained were
	allocated for investment in 4G mobile network (especially for settlement of licenses acquired in 4G auction) and for maintenance
	of liquidity and extension of debts.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT; COLOR: #222222">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT; COLOR: #222222">
	(4)
	Non-privileged single series public unsecured nonconvertible debentures, all registered- and book entry-type. Funds obtained were
	allocated for amortization of debt, capital expenditures of projects developed and reinforcement of liquidity.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -14.2PT; COLOR: #222222">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Transaction costs associated
	with items (3) and (4) described above, totaling R$495 at December 31, 2016 (R$990 at December 31, 2015), was allocated as a reduction
	of liabilities and are recognized as financial expenses, according to the contractual terms of this issue.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	d)
<U>
	Covenants
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	There are loans and financing
	with BNDES (Note 21.a) and debentures (all described in Note 21.b) with specific covenants for penalty in the event of breach of
	contract. A breach of contract provided for in the agreements with the institutions listed above is characterized as noncompliance
	with covenants (analyzed on a quarterly, half-yearly or yearly basis), breach of a contractual clause, resulting in the early settlement
	of the contract.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	At December 31, 2016 and 2015 all economic and financial indexes established in existing contracts have been achieved.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	Includes to a portion of the Company&rsquo;s liability arising from an
	agreement entered into with ANATEL, whereby the operators that won this auction organized Entidade Administradora do Processo de
	Redistribui&ccedil;&atilde;o e Digitaliza&ccedil;&atilde;o de Canais de TV e RTV (&ldquo;EAD&rdquo;), which will be responsible
	for equally performing all TV and RTV channel redistribution procedures and solutions to harmful interference in radio communication
	systems, in addition to other operations in which the winning operators have obligations, as defined in the agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	This refers to the loan made to holders of the remaining stock (common
	and preferred) resulting from reverse split and fractioning of the shares of the Company and the merged companies.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<B>
	23)
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
<B>
	EQUITY
</B>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	a)
<U>
	Capital
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	According to its Articles of
	Incorporation, the Company is authorized to increase its share capital up to 1,850,000,000 shares. The Board of Directors is the
	competent body to decide on any increase and consequent issue of new shares within the authorized capital limit.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Nevertheless, Brazil&rsquo;s
	Corporation Law (Law n&ordm; 6404/76, Article 166, item IV) - establishes that capital may be increased by means of a Special Shareholders&rsquo;
	Meeting resolution to decide about amendments to the Articles of Incorporation, if authorized capital increase limit has been reached.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Capital increases do not necessarily
	observe the proportion between the numbers of shares of each class to be maintained, however the number of non-voting or restricted-voting
	preferred shares must not exceed 2/3 of total shares issued.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Preferred shares are non-voting,
	except for cases set forth in Articles 9 and 10 of the Articles of Incorporation, but have priority in the event of reimbursement
	of capital, without premium, and are entitled to dividends 10% higher than those paid on common shares, as per article 7 of the
	Company's Articles of Incorporation and item II, paragraph 1, article 17 of Law No. 6404/76.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Preferred shares are also entitled
	to full voting rights if the Company fails to pay the minimum dividend to which they are entitled for three consecutive financial
	years and this right will be kept until payment of said dividend.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 220; VALUE: 1 -->

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	At a meeting held on April 28, 2015, the Company&rsquo;s Board of Directors
	unanimously approved a capital increase of R$15,812,000, through the issue of registered book-entry common and preferred shares
	with no par value for the unit issue price of R$38.47 and R$47.00, respectively.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	At a meeting held on April 30, 2015, the Company&rsquo;s Board of Directors
	unanimously approved a capital increase of R$295,285, through the issue of preferred registered, book-entry common shares with
	no par value at the unit issue price of R$47.00.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	The Special Shareholders&rsquo; Meeting held on May 28, 2015, approved
	a capital increase of R$9,666,021, through the issue of preferred book-entry, no-par-value Company shares due to the incorporation
	of GVTPart. shares.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a.2)
<U>
	Company share swap transactions
	between Telef&oacute;nica and FrHolding108
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On June 24, 2015, the share
	swap transaction (&quot;swap&quot;) between Telef&oacute;nica and FrHolding108 was concluded, whereby FrHolding108 transferred
	to Telef&oacute;nica 76,656,559 shares representing 4.5% of the Company's capital, of which 68,597,306 are common shares representing
	12% of that type of shares and 8,059,253 are preferred shares representing 0.72% of the shares of that type issued by the Company,
	in exchange for 1,110,000,000 shares representing 8.2% of the common shares of Telecom Italia, previously held by TELCO, a subsidiary
	of Telef&oacute;nica.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On July 29, 2015, after close
	of the New York Stock Exchange, Vivendi disposed of 67,861,632 preferred Company shares representing 4% of its share capital. On
	the same date, the share swap transaction was concluded between Telef&oacute;nica and FrHolding108, thus resulting in the transfer
	of 46,000,000 shares issued by Telef&oacute;nica held in treasury to FrHolding108, in exchange for 58,400,000 preferred shares
	issued by the Company and held by FrHolding108, transferred to Telef&oacute;nica. As such, Telef&oacute;nica&rsquo;s equity interest
	in the Company increased by 5.2% in relation to total preferred shares and 3.5% in relation to the Company's total share capital.
	Alternatively, equity interest of FrHolding108 in the Company was reduced in the same proportion and therefore, as from such date,
	FrHolding108 no longer holds any equity interest in the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a.3)
<U>
	Internal reorganization
	of the Telef&oacute;nica Group
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	As a result of Telef&oacute;nica
	Group's internal reorganization process in the fourth quarter of 2016, Telef&oacute;nica Internacional S.A. (&quot;TISA&quot;)
	was merged into Telef&oacute;nica Latinoam&eacute;rica Holding, SL (&quot;TLH&quot;), a Spanish company whose entire capital and
	control is held by Telef&oacute;nica S.A. (&quot;TESA&quot;). Consequently, the entire ownership interest in the Company, previously
	held by TISA, was fully transferred to TLH.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Accordingly, TLH now holds 24.09%
	of the Company's capital stock, represented by 46,746,635 common shares and 360,532,578 preferred shares.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This transaction did not cause
	any change in the composition of the Company's control, its administrative structure or its regular operation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a.4)
<U>
	Distribution of capital
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Paid-in capital at December
	31, 2016 and 2015 amounted to R$63,571,416. After all the events described above, subscribed and paid-in capital is divided into
	shares without par value, held as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	b)
<U>
	Premium on acquisition
	of interests
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In accordance with accounting
	practices adopted in Brazil prior to the adoption of IFRS, goodwill was recorded when shares were acquired at a higher value than
	their carrying amount, generated by the difference between the carrying amount of shares acquired and the transaction&rsquo;s fair
	value. With the adoption of IFRS 10, the effects of all acquisition of shares from non-controlling shareholders are recorded under
	equity when there is no change in the controlling shareholding. Consequently, these transactions no longer generate goodwill or
	income, and the goodwill previously generated from acquisition from non-controlling shareholders was adjusted matched against the
	Company&rsquo;s equity.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The balance of this account
	at December 31, 2015 totaled R$75,388, which was reclassified to Other Capital Reserves during 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	c.2)
<U>
	Other capital reserves
</U>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	At December 31, 2014, other
	capital reserves included: (i) R$63,074 related to the tax benefit generated by the merger of Telef&ocirc;nica Data do Brasil Ltda.
	which will be capitalized in favor of the controlling shareholder (SP Telecomunica&ccedil;&otilde;es Participa&ccedil;&otilde;es
	Ltda.) after realization of the tax credit, pursuant to CVM Instruction No. 319/99; and (ii) R$2,735,930, related to the excess
	of the value in the issue or capitalization, in relation to the basic value of the share on the issue date.
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15PT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	This reserve is set up by allocation of 5% of the net income for the year,
	up to the limit of 20% of the paid-up capital. Legal reserve will only be used to increase capital and offset accumulated losses.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15PT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	In accordance with Article 196 of Law No. 6404/76 and, based on capital
	budget to be submitted for consideration and approval at the General Shareholders&rsquo; Meeting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 15PT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 14.15PT">
	The Company has State VAT (ICMS) tax benefits in the states of Minas Gerais
	and Esp&iacute;rito Santo, relating to tax credits approved by the relevant bodies of said states, in connection with investments
	in the installation of SMP support equipment, fully operational, in accordance with the rules in force, ensuring that the localities
	listed in the call for bid be included in the SMP coverage area. The portion of profit subject to the incentive was excluded from
	dividend calculation, and may be used only in the event of capital increase or loss absorption.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 8PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On April 28, 2016, the Company&rsquo;s
	General Shareholders&rsquo; Meeting approved the allocation of proposed additional dividends for 2015, not yet distributed, amounting
	to R$1,287,223, equivalent to R$0.71487468232 and R$0.78636215055 for common and preferred shares, respectively, to common and
	preferred shareholders in the Company&rsquo;s records at the end of the day of that meeting. The amount was paid in December 2016.
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The manner proposed by management
	for payment of dividends was:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	For 2016:
</U>
	The remaining
	unallocated balance of net income for the year ended December 31, 2016, amounting to R$1,698,694, plus equity instruments lapsed
	in 2016 amounting to R$221,559 and reversal special reserve for expansion and modernization of 2016 amounting to R$700,000 and
	less other comprehensive income amounting to R$156,266, totaling R$2,463,987. The amount of R$550,000 was classified as &quot;Special
	Reserve for Expansion and Modernization&quot; and R$1,913,987 was classified as additional proposed dividends in accordance with
	the management proposal for allocation of income for the year, submitted and approved at the General Shareholders&rsquo; Meeting.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	For 2015:
</U>
	The remaining
	unallocated balance of net income for the year ended December 31, 2015, amounting to R$1,228,232, plus equity instruments lapsed
	in 2015 amounting to R$494,001 and other comprehensive income amounting to R$264,990, totaling R$1,987,223. The amount of R$700,000
	was classified as &quot;Special Reserve for Expansion and Modernization&quot; and R$1,287,223 was classified as additional proposed
	dividends in accordance with the management proposal for allocation of income for the year, submitted and approved at the General
	Shareholders&rsquo; Meeting on April 28, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 14.15PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: RED">
